scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build

flutter.lsp.initialization.onlyAnalyzePr.description: When set to true, analysis will only be performed for projects that have open files rather than the root workspace folder.

flutter.lsp.initialization.suggestFromUn.description: When set to false, completion will not include synbols that are not already imported into the current file

flutter.lsp.initialization.closingLabels.description: When set to true, dart/textDocument/publishClosingLabels notifications will be sent with information to render editor closing labels.

flutter.sdk.dart-command.description: dart command, leave empty should just work

flutter.sdk.dart-lookup.description: command to find dart executable location, used to infer dart-sdk location

flutter.sdk.flutter-lookup.description: command to find flutter executable location, used to infer location of dart-sdk in flutter cache

flutter.openDevLogSplitCommand.description: Vim command to open dev log window, like: `botright 10split`

flutter.workspaceFolder.ignore.description: Path start within the list will not treat as workspaceFolder

flutter.runDevToolsAtStartup.description: Automatically run the DevTools debugger in a web browser when running a project

flutter.commands.devicesTimeout.description: Sets the `--device-timout` flag when running `flutter devices`

dart.analysisExcludedFolders.description: An array of paths (absolute or relative to each workspace folder) that should be excluded from analysis.

dart.enableSdkFormatter.description: When set to false, prevents registration (or unregisters) the SDK formatter. When set to true or not supplied, will register/reregister the SDK formatter.

dart.lineLength.description: The number of characters the formatter should wrap code at. If unspecified, code will be wrapped at 80 characters.

dart.completeFunctionCalls.description: Completes functions/methods with their required parameters.

dart.showTodos.description: Whether to generate diagnostics for TODO comments. If unspecified, diagnostics will not be generated.

commands.title: Create flutter project using: flutter create project-name
